mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board (member_id, prod_nm, rev_ttl, rev_cont, rev_stars, rev_views, rev_reg_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{prodNm}, #{revTtl}, #{revCont}, #{revStars}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review_board ORDER BY rev_reg_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET rev_views = rev_views + 1 WHERE rev_id = #{revId}
